name: Magic Forest (itch) (tfrei)
description:
Magic Forest is a short game on a King need to cross a strange and magic forest to reach at the Luminous Fountain.

This game was made with Unity and the source code are available at my github profile:

https://github.com/freitagtiago/MagicForest

The game has taken 11 days to be developed.

Credits

Programming
Tiago Freitag
